opencms-module-maven-plugin - OpenCms Module Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2015-02-15  | Version: 1.1-SNAPSHOT
opencms-module-maven-plugin - OpenCms Module Maven Plugin
Parent Project
  • KamomileWare Maven Plugins Parent
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

opencms-module:module

Full name:

com.kamomileware.maven.plugin.opencms:opencms-module-maven-plugin:1.1-SNAPSHOT:module

Description:

Build opencms module. The process includes the manifest generation if ${generate.manifest} and module properties descriptor are set. This goal is binded to package building phase for the opencms-module projects.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: compile+runtime.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: package.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
cacheFile File - The file containing the module structure cache.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/module/work/webapp-cache.xml.
moduleDirectory File - The directory where the module is built.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/${project.build.finalName}.
moduleName String - The name of the generated module.
User property is: project.build.finalName.
moduleSourceDirectory File - Single directory for extra files to include in the module.
Default value is: ${basedir}/src/main/module.
outputDirectory String - The directory for the generated module.
User property is: project.build.directory.
workDirectory File - Directory to copy conversed to native resources into if needed
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/module/work.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
archive MavenArchiveConfiguration - The archive configuration to use. See Maven Archiver Reference.
archiveClasses boolean - Whether a JAR file will be created for the classes in the module. Using this optional configuration parameter will make the generated classes to be archived into a jar file and the classes directory will then be excluded from the module.
Default value is: false.
User property is: archiveClasses.
attachClasses boolean - Whether classes (module/classes or lib directory) should be attached to the project.
Default value is: true.
classesClassifier String - The classifier to use for the attached classes artifact.
classifier String - Classifier to add to the generated module file. If given, the artifact will be an attachment instead. The classifier will not be applied to the jar file of the project - only to the module file.
descriptorsDir File - Folder for storing manifest descriptors
Default value is: ${basedir}/src/main/manifest.
User property is: module.descriptors.dir.
descriptorsEncoding String - Manifest descriptors encoding
Default value is: default.
User property is: module.descriptors.encoding.
descriptorsN2AApply boolean - Whether native to ascii apply
Default value is: false.
User property is: module.descriptors.n2aapply.
descriptorsN2AConfig PlainEncodingConfig - (no description)
dryRun boolean - (no description)
Default value is: false.
User property is: dryrun.
escapeString String - Expression preceded with the String won't be interpolated \${foo} will be replaced with ${foo}
User property is: maven.module.escapeString.
escapedBackslashesInFilePath boolean - To escape interpolated value with windows path c:\foo\bar will be replaced with c:\\foo\\bar
Default value is: false.
User property is: maven.module.escapedBackslashesInFilePath.
failOnMissingManifestXml boolean - Whether or not to fail the build is the manifest.xml file is missing. Set to false if you want you module built without a manifest.xml file, besides the module won't be installable on OpenCms system.
Default value is: true.
User property is: failOnMissingManifestXml.
filteringDeploymentDescriptors boolean - To filtering deployment descriptors disabled by default
Default value is: false.
User property is: maven.module.filteringManifestDescriptors.
filters List - Filters (property files) to include during the interpolation of the pom.xml.
generateManifestXml boolean - Whether to generate the manifest if it doent exist
Default value is: true.
User property is: generate.manifest.xml.
manifestEncoding String - Charset to encode the generated module manifest;
User property is: manifest.encoding.
manifestXml File - The path to the web.xml file to use.
User property is: maven.module.manifestxml.
moduleResources ModuleResource[] - The list of webResources we want to transfer.
moduleSourceEncoding String - The comma separated list of tokens to exclude when copying content of the moduleSourceDirectory.
moduleSourceExcludes String - The comma separated list of tokens to exclude when copying content of the moduleSourceDirectory.
moduleSourceIncludes String - The comma separated list of tokens to include when copying content of the moduleSourceDirectory. Default is '**'.
moduleSourceTargetDirectory String - Relative path where source directory will be placed in the module.
nonFilteredFileExtensions List - A list of file extensions to not filtering. will be used for webResources and overlay filtering
openCmsWebappName String - Name of the webapp aplication name for OpenCms.
User property is: opencms.webapp.name.
outputFileNameMapping String - The file name mapping to use to copy libraries and tlds. If no file mapping is set (default) the file is copied with its standard name.
packagingExcludes String - The comma separated list of tokens to exclude from the module before packaging.
packagingIncludes String - The comma separated list of tokens to include in the module before packaging. By default everything is included.
primaryArtifact boolean - Whether this is the main artifact being built. Set to false if you don't want to install or deploy it to the local repository instead of the default one in an execution.
Default value is: true.
User property is: primaryArtifact.
useCache boolean - Whether the cache should be used to save the status of the module accross multiple runs.
Default value is: true.
User property is: useCache.

Parameter Details

archive:

The archive configuration to use. See Maven Archiver Reference.
  • Type: org.apache.maven.archiver.MavenArchiveConfiguration
  • Required: No

archiveClasses:

Whether a JAR file will be created for the classes in the module. Using this optional configuration parameter will make the generated classes to be archived into a jar file and the classes directory will then be excluded from the module.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: archiveClasses
  • Default: false

attachClasses:

Whether classes (module/classes or lib directory) should be attached to the project.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Default: true

cacheFile:

The file containing the module structure cache.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/module/work/webapp-cache.xml

classesClassifier:

The classifier to use for the attached classes artifact.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

classifier:

Classifier to add to the generated module file. If given, the artifact will be an attachment instead. The classifier will not be applied to the jar file of the project - only to the module file.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

descriptorsDir:

Folder for storing manifest descriptors
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • User Property: module.descriptors.dir
  • Default: ${basedir}/src/main/manifest

descriptorsEncoding:

Manifest descriptors encoding
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: module.descriptors.encoding
  • Default: default

descriptorsN2AApply:

Whether native to ascii apply
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: module.descriptors.n2aapply
  • Default: false

descriptorsN2AConfig:

(no description)
  • Type: com.kamomileware.maven.plugin.opencms.PlainEncodingConfig
  • Required: No

dryRun:

(no description)
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: dryrun
  • Default: false

escapeString:

Expression preceded with the String won't be interpolated \${foo} will be replaced with ${foo}
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: maven.module.escapeString

escapedBackslashesInFilePath:

To escape interpolated value with windows path c:\foo\bar will be replaced with c:\\foo\\bar
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: maven.module.escapedBackslashesInFilePath
  • Default: false

failOnMissingManifestXml:

Whether or not to fail the build is the manifest.xml file is missing. Set to false if you want you module built without a manifest.xml file, besides the module won't be installable on OpenCms system.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: failOnMissingManifestXml
  • Default: true

filteringDeploymentDescriptors:

To filtering deployment descriptors disabled by default
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: maven.module.filteringManifestDescriptors
  • Default: false

filters:

Filters (property files) to include during the interpolation of the pom.xml.
  • Type: java.util.List
  • Required: No

generateManifestXml:

Whether to generate the manifest if it doent exist
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: generate.manifest.xml
  • Default: true

manifestEncoding:

Charset to encode the generated module manifest;
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: manifest.encoding

manifestXml:

The path to the web.xml file to use.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • User Property: maven.module.manifestxml

moduleDirectory:

The directory where the module is built.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/${project.build.finalName}

moduleName:

The name of the generated module.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: project.build.finalName

moduleResources:

The list of webResources we want to transfer.
  • Type: com.kamomileware.maven.plugin.opencms.ModuleResource[]
  • Required: No

moduleSourceDirectory:

Single directory for extra files to include in the module.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ${basedir}/src/main/module

moduleSourceEncoding:

The comma separated list of tokens to exclude when copying content of the moduleSourceDirectory.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

moduleSourceExcludes:

The comma separated list of tokens to exclude when copying content of the moduleSourceDirectory.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

moduleSourceIncludes:

The comma separated list of tokens to include when copying content of the moduleSourceDirectory. Default is '**'.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

moduleSourceTargetDirectory:

Relative path where source directory will be placed in the module.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

nonFilteredFileExtensions:

A list of file extensions to not filtering. will be used for webResources and overlay filtering
  • Type: java.util.List
  • Required: No

openCmsWebappName:

Name of the webapp aplication name for OpenCms.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: opencms.webapp.name

outputDirectory:

The directory for the generated module.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: project.build.directory

outputFileNameMapping:

The file name mapping to use to copy libraries and tlds. If no file mapping is set (default) the file is copied with its standard name.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

packagingExcludes:

The comma separated list of tokens to exclude from the module before packaging.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

packagingIncludes:

The comma separated list of tokens to include in the module before packaging. By default everything is included.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

primaryArtifact:

Whether this is the main artifact being built. Set to false if you don't want to install or deploy it to the local repository instead of the default one in an execution.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: primaryArtifact
  • Default: true

useCache:

Whether the cache should be used to save the status of the module accross multiple runs.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: useCache
  • Default: true

workDirectory:

Directory to copy conversed to native resources into if needed
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/module/work
